name: The Cow Jumped Over The Moonbase
name_original: The Cow Jumped Over The Moonbase
description:
Created in collaboration with Ainslie Cleverdon and Aleksis Andžāns for a Southampton Solent University Game Jam. The game won in a majority of the criteria.

The themes were:

  • Cow
  • Llama
  • Beard
  • International Observe the moon night
